long_description: Gear up to take on the routes near the Saint Vrain in Colorado with the detailed and well-illustrated. Author: Bernard Gillett. Softcover; 424 pages; black-and-white photographs; black-and-white maps and illustrations. Sharp End Publishing; copyright 2009. Section overview, detail and individual climb maps help orient you to the targeted climb; illustrated photographs chart your route up the wall. Guide provides all essential information and then some: season, access, length, difficulty and surrounding points of interest. Easy-to-decipher icons indicate steepness, route ratings, number of routes, gear needed, time to approach, hazards, direction of cliff faces and best months for climbing.
short_description: Gear up to take on the routes near the Saint Vrain in Colorado with the detailed and well-illustrated Rock Climbing St Vrain Canyons .
